Functions of the Employee Committee

As the Employee Committee in our company with two presidents, each responsible for overseeing the frontend and backend areas respectively, our functions are as follows:

  • Employee Representation: We act as representatives of the employees to the company's management, ensuring their rights are respected and promoting a fair and equitable work environment.
  • Negotiation and Dialogue: We participate in negotiations and dialogues with the company's management to address issues related to working conditions, salaries, benefits, schedules, training, and professional development, among other aspects that impact employees.
  • Communication and Transparency: We facilitate effective communication between employees and the company's management, ensuring that relevant information is shared in a timely and transparent manner. We are also the communication channel to gather employee concerns and suggestions.

    • Functions of the Employee Committee

    As the Employee Committee in our company with two presidents, each responsible for overseeing the frontend and backend areas respectively, our functions are as follows:

    • Employee Representation: We act as representatives of the employees to the company's management, ensuring their rights are respected and promoting a fair and equitable work environment.
    • Negotiation and Dialogue: We participate in negotiations and dialogues with the company's management to address issues related to working conditions, salaries, benefits, schedules, training, and professional development, among other aspects that impact employees.
    • Communication and Transparency: We facilitate effective communication between employees and the company's management, ensuring that relevant information is shared in a timely and transparent manner. We are also the communication channel to gather employee concerns and suggestions.
    • Conflict Resolution: Through mediation and constructive dialogue, we work to resolve labor conflicts that may arise between employees and the company's management, seeking mutually beneficial solutions and promoting a harmonious work environment.
    • Compliance Monitoring: We oversee compliance with labor laws, safety regulations, and any other applicable regulations that affect employees. We ensure that standards and legal requirements related to work in both the frontend and backend areas are respected.
    • Employee Development and Well-being: We promote programs and policies that foster professional development, well-being, and employee satisfaction in both areas. We work to identify growth opportunities, training, and benefits that enhance the quality of work-life.

    These are some of the functions that we, as the Employee Committee, perform in our company, ensuring effective employee representation and contributing to the success and well-being of all team members.
